name: Corona Runner (Cipery)
description:
Hi, thanks for checking out our game!

This game is a variation of infinite runner games, but with a little twist. We hope you'll enjoy our first team game. Development of this game was a pure blast! lots of fun, trial & errors, red eyes from lack of sleep - but it was totally worth it! 

Controls:
[SPACE] for jump
[CTRL] for slide
[ENTER] for pistol fire (hold the button, works only for corona viruses!)

Obstacles are somewhat random generated. 

Thanks.
Roman and Daniel
